Judge calls cash counterfeiter Karen Chappell a menace, sentences her to nine months home detention https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/judge-calls-cash-counterfeiter-karen-chappell-a-menace-sentences-her-to-nine-months-home-detention/Y65FDDSVVFBFBBEODNG6Z7JZXUI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/judge-calls-cash-counterfeiter-karen-chappell-a-menace-sentences-her-to-nine-months-home-detention/Y65FDDSVVFBFBBEODNG6Z7JZXUI/ Tracy NealNow a judge has described one of the women involved as a menace to the community. Wed, 02 Oct 2024 07:00:00 +0000 A couple's money-printing venture in a motel was sprung by the maid who found scrunched-up fake bank notes when she cleaned their room. Photo / 123RF
Auroras in Auckland incoming? Unusually intense solar flare blasted from the Sun https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auroras-in-auckland-incoming-unusually-intense-solar-flare-blasted-from-the-sun/63M546NVPREN3BRN6GTFUJ7CCA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auroras-in-auckland-incoming-unusually-intense-solar-flare-blasted-from-the-sun/63M546NVPREN3BRN6GTFUJ7CCA/ Jamie MortonAstro-photographers could soon be in for another treat: Nasa records a major solar flare. Wed, 02 Oct 2024 05:49:18 +0000 Nasa’s Solar Dynamics Observatory captured this image of a solar flare – seen as the bright flash in the lower left – on October 1. The image shows a subset of extreme ultraviolet light that highlights the extremely hot material in flares and which is colorised in red and orange. Photo / Nasa, SDO
